‘Chrono-working’ tipped to be NZ’s next big employment craze https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/chrono-working-tipped-to-be-nzs-next-big-employment-craze/3WSWRZSYIJG3BJH34PVYE457VM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/chrono-working-tipped-to-be-nzs-next-big-employment-craze/3WSWRZSYIJG3BJH34PVYE457VM/ Chris KeallBut are bosses suffering Next Big Thing fatigue? Mon, 09 Sep 2024 17:00:00 +0000 "Chrono-working" means ditching 9-to-5 and working to your circadian rhythm, or your body's natural 24-hour clock. That might mean starting early, starting late or napping in the middle of the day. Photo / Getty Images

Mon, 09 Sep 2024 23:00:00 +0000 Sitting all day at work, or on long drives, can lead to gluteal amnesia, or 'dead butt syndrome, which may cause chronic pain. Photo / 123rf
